document.full_text: the high-flying orioles were brought down to earth by a two-game new york yankees sweep but baltimore looked to rise again friday by handing the ball to one of their top reasons for optimism, pitcher zach britton.
document.title: britton fuels optimism for baltimore's rising orioles
lines_and_colors: the high-flying orioles were brought down to earth by a two-game new york yankees sweep but baltimore looked to rise again friday by handing the ball to one of their top reasons for optimism, pitcher zach britton.
